root.Table: select bsm, zsbsm, ywh, djjg, zsgbh, szsj, dbsj, sbh, bdcqzh, qlr, gyqk, zl, bdcdyh, qllx, qlxz, yt, mj, syqx, qlqtzk, fj, zjh, signvalue, signcert, tnsvalue, zszt, qmzt, tszt, xzqbm, fwqbm, qlbm, qlbsm, zslx, qmsj, tssj from bdcqz WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, dzwqlbm, dzwqlbsm, zdzhqlbm, zdzhqlbsm, zt, djjg, xzqbm, fwqbm, tszt, tssj from bdcdyqlgx_1 where TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, cfwh, djsj, cfjg, bzxr, zl, djjg, bdcqzh, jfsj, xzqbm, fwqbm, cfbsm, qlbm, qlbsm, tszt, tssj, zt from cfdj_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM

select bsm, djsj, bdcdjzmh, dyqx, ywr, djjg, qlr, qlrzjh, bdbzqsz, zgzqse, dysx, dyfs, zxsj, xzqbm, fwqbm, dybsm, qlbm, qlbsm, qmzt, qmsj, tszt, tssj, zt from dyaq_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM

select bsm, jzmj, tnjzmj, zl, djjg, ghyt, fwxz, qlrlx, qlr, zjh, gyqk, qlbl, bdcqzh, djsj, zxsj, zcs, xzqbm, fwqbm, qlbm, qlbsm, tszt, tssj, zt from fdcq_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, dybsm, bdcdyh, zl, djjg, szc, zcs, xzqbm, fwqbm, tszt, tssj, qlbsm, qlbm, jcnf, jzmj, fwxz, fwyt from fwxx_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM

select bsm, qlr, zdmj, syqx, bdcqzh, jzmj, jzrjl, jzmd, djjg, qlxz, jzwzdmj, tdyt, syqmj, zl, djsj, jzxg, qlsdfs, zjh, xzqbm, fwqbm, qlbm, qlbsm, tszt, tssj, zt from jsydsyq_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, qlrmc, zjzl, zjh, djjg, lxdh, qlbm, qlbsm, xzqbm, fwqbm, tszt, tssj, zsbsm from qlr_1 WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, bh, sqr, sqsj, sqsx, ly1, ly2, lysm2, ly3, lysm3, zxdh, djjg, gzsj, zjh, xzqbm, fwqbm, tszt, tssj, byslbsm, qlbm, qlbsm from byslgzs WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
select bsm, bh, sqr, sqsj, sqsx, ly1, ly2, ly3, ly4, sm, zxdh, djjg, gzsj, zjh, xzqbm, fwqbm, tszt, tssj, bydjbsm, djywh from bydjgzs WHERE TSZT='0' and rownum <=500 order by BSM
